abstract: A wave of deals in what is typically a sleepy summer month is keeping bankers and analysts very busy. Yet the giants in M.&A. advisory work have seen their shares of the market slump in August, according to Thomson Reuters data.

lead_paragraph: A wave of deals in what is typically a sleepy summer month is keeping bankers and analysts very busy. Yet the giants in M.&A. advisory work have seen their shares of the market slump in August, according to Thomson Reuters data.

headline.main: For Big Firms, It’s Been Light in August
